level.text: Each owner or operator shall use an UST system that is made of or lined with materials that are compatible with the substance stored in the UST system.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 40 DCR 7835, 7865 (November 12, 1993); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 7699 (October 1, 1999).
